name: Coloursmith
html_description:
An website made in collaboration with Greenback.

An online marketplace for gardening with a multitude of features where you can:

  • Buy, sell, gift and request seeds, plants, produce, gardening equipment, and more from your local community.
  • Access detailed guides to growing plants, fruits and vegetables.
  • Keep track of the growth of your plants with the planting log.
